TopicTitle: I actually enjoy RP being gone.

Articles.Content: After a couple weeks of RP being gone. I realized that I like it this way. It has let me write some great stories in fan fiction, as well as turn my attention to many other parts of the forums. I think it also took a lot of stress and anger at others off my back, and I don\'t get too angry about things now. I will be playing Radion\'s RP, but I understand there will be better rules too. I can\'t believe I\'m saying this, but thanks, guys for deleting the RP forums.
